alert.note: Alert for Bolivar Peninsula; Chambers (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 4:16PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Galveston and southeastern Chambers Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 416 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Stowell, or 10 miles southwest of Hamshire, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Stowell and Winnie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
